lead_paragraph: Jose Bernazard received a prison term of at least 59 years for shooting an officer who tried to intervene in a 2013 attack on a woman Mr. Bernazard had stalked.

headline.print_headline: Queens Man Is Sentenced in Shooting of Officer
headline.main: Queens Man Is Sentenced in Shooting of Off-Duty Officer

snippet: Jose Bernazard received a prison term of at least 59 years for shooting an officer who tried to intervene in a 2013 attack on a woman Mr. Bernazard had stalked.
abstract: Jose L Bernazard is sentenced in New York State Supreme Court, following his conviction on second-degree attempted murder charge, to at least 59 years in prison in connection with 2013 shooting of off-duty Police Officer Joseph Koch.
